item.title: "The real truth about bp and what is happening in the gulf"
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:15, topic:345886”][quote author=Frell link=topic=442266.msg3249857#msg3249857 date=1277663658]
Im not really following the story because i really don’t care and i know Obama doesn’t care. The only thing he cares about is his healthcare fuck up, which is his sole mission in his presidency.
[/quote]The sole mission in his presidency is to set us up for the ultimate fuck. He is putting all the pieces together that other presidents have left behind.

Also, oil may be floating, but it can also go under/over the “boom”. I can’t wait till the major hurricanes come and spread it all over the bottom right corner of the US LOL! [/quote]
And when it backwashes out of the gulf and gets caught in the gulf stream straight to Europe LOL!

Read full topic

item.title: "The real truth about bp and what is happening in the gulf"
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:345886”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=442266.msg3249793#msg3249793 date=1277658900]
What I don’t understand is, it isn’t that hard to prevent the spreading of the oil, is it?

Oil floats on water, right? Therefore, encircling an area around the leak with floating ‘walls’ should keep the oil in its place, and would allow them to skim it off. I’m obviously missing something, but what?
[/quote]
They already did that, then they found out that some oil isn’t floating.[/quote]That is a lie, they are adding a chemical to make the oil ball up and become clumps. AKA sinking to the bottom.

Read full topic

item.title: "The real truth about bp and what is happening in the gulf"
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Conspiracy theories mainly show a disconnection from the individual to the wider community, therefore producing paronia. You can see this in the way they don’t point out structural problems but only mysterious threats to their existence. The ways in which conspiracys are able to be acceptable, believable and available shows more that they exist as an integrated part of the whole, therefore the real conspiracy lies everywhere in the everyday actions of all of us, for better or worse.

Read full topic
